item.title: About
item.description: I am a 25 year-old back-end software developer working in Walpole MA, at a company that primarily develops in Allegro Common Lisp. I spend most of my days writing LISP code, so naturally, I am also a big fan of emacs and spend my working hours with it full screen (which also helps me forget I’m in Windows). Outside of work, I am an avid Linux user that loves learning about programming (especially functional languages), computers, and open source technologies.

item.title: Homelab
item.description:
This is a page where I maintain the status of the computers in my “Homelab”. I will list my current systems here (potentially with screenshots of my current desktop setup for my workstations), as well as network diagrams of our current setup. Network Network Diagram * A Little Out of Date Computers Ryan (Me) My Main Computer Setup (Alakazam) My Workstation Area My Workstation Standing Desk
- Alakazam (Main Workstation Laptop) System76 Bonobo Extreme Intel i7 4810-MQ [2.
